```{r eval = F}
library(formattable)
d <- as.vector(jsonlite::fromJSON('_tests.json'))
df <- data.frame(
  id = seq_along(d),
  test = names(d),
  status = sapply(d, '[[', 1)
)
rownames(df) <- NULL

formattable(df, list(
  status = formatter("span", 
    style = x ~ style(color = ifelse(x == 2, "red", "green")),
    x ~ icontext(ifelse(x == 2, "remove", "ok"), ifelse(x, "Yes", "No"))
  )
))
```
